### getFilename() {#ab5eafaf67b9a450116b00366916c375b}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["static"]}>
Extract a filename for a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/disubprogram">DISubprogram</a>.

Prefer relative paths in the coverage notes. Clang also may split up absolute paths into a directory and filename component. When the relative path doesn&#39;t exist, reconstruct the absolute path.

<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A function has a unique identifier, a checksum (we leave as zero) and a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// set of blocks and a map of edges between blocks. This is the only GCOV</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// object users can construct, the blocks and lines will be rooted here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
